deposit().details: - Owner is set to SafEth contract

initialize(address).details: - This replaces the constructor for upgradeable contracts

params._owner: - owner of the contract which handles stake/unstake

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: - Owner is set to SafEth contract

deposit().notice: - Owner only function to Deposit ETH into derivative

ethPerDerivative(uint256).notice: - Get price of derivative in terms of ETH

initialize(address).notice: - Function to initialize values for the contracts

setMaxSlippage(uint256).notice: - Owner only function to set max slippage for derivative

withdraw(uint256).notice: - Owner only function to Convert derivative into ETH
